title: 06/21/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/21/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the wild weekend in the NBA Playoffs. The Philadelphia Inquirier’s Mike Sielski joins us fo discuss Ben Simmons’ future in Philly. The Sun’s VP Ann Meyers Drysdale calls in to discuss the Suns performance without Chris Paul. And Reggie Miller makes his weekly pit stop and chooses between Lebron and KD.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
